processed.result: Two players take turns shooting at a target. Player 1 has a probability of $p_1$ of hitting the target each time they shoot, and Player 2 has a probability of $p_2$ of hitting the target each time they shoot. Two players take turns trying to hit a target. The first player has a certain chance of hitting the target each turn, and the second player has a different chance. What is the probability that the first player will win by hitting the target first?
